title: Antibiotic usage by surveillance category
subtitle: Reported usage of antibiotics, measured in [defined daily doses](#dod:defined-daily-doses) per 1,000 people in each category based on the WHO's classification. Antibiotics are classified into three groups: [Access](#dod:access-antibiotics), [Watch](#dod:watch-antibiotics), and [Reserve](#dod:reserve-antibiotics), taking into account the impact of different antibiotics and antibiotic classes on antimicrobial resistance.

display.name: Access antibiotics
display.unit: defined daily doses per 1000 inhabitants per day

display.name: Watch antibiotics
display.unit: defined daily doses per 1000 inhabitants per day

display.name: Reserve antibiotics
display.unit: defined daily doses per 1000 inhabitants per day
